ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Chant of Battle problems
ygData.msgSnippet: I was the one didn t understand why enchanters use their DD s, DOT s RATHER than buffing and debuffing.  I guess i think of the choke line as a debuff, not a
ygData.messageBody:
I was the one didn't understand why enchanters use their DD's, DOT's
RATHER than buffing and debuffing. I guess i think of the choke line as
a debuff, not a DOT as the damage on it is rather small.

I usually don't like telling other people what to do. If I see
something really bad, like healers not healing when people are low I
will say something. I also always harp on assisting the tank, but
people never seem to figure that one out. People do all kind of crazy
things, "Damage shields are worthless" "I don't think you need SOW to
pull.". My reaction depends on my mood mostly. If they want me to pull
and won't SOW me (this being my troll warrior, not my self SOWing bard),
he will just sit there till he gets a SOW or sees a mob withing bow
range. He will not move. You don't want to give me hp/ac buffs? Fine,
but don't assume I'm going to keep taunting stuff off you.

I really hate getting pick up groups, but fortunatly I have a good
memory, so I know who to refuse to group with.
--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
